author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: List tag bindings (key value pair) applied to a project/folder/organization object.
commands.name: gcp-iam-tagbindings-list

commands.description: Disables a service account key.
commands.name: gcp-iam-service-account-key-disable

commands.description: Adds a new folder IAM policy.
commands.name: gcp-iam-folder-iam-policy-create

commands.description: Lists service account keys, or retrieves a specific service account key information. One of the arguments: 'service_account_name' or 'key_name'  must be provided.
commands.name: gcp-iam-service-account-keys-get

commands.description: Creates a service account in project.
commands.name: gcp-iam-service-account-create

commands.description: Sets the IAM access control policy for the specified project. This operation will overwrite any existing policy.
commands.name: gcp-iam-project-iam-policy-set

commands.description: Removes members from the folder policy.
commands.name: gcp-iam-folder-iam-member-remove

commands.description: Removes a policy from the organization IAM policies.
commands.name: gcp-iam-organization-iam-policy-remove

commands.description: Creates a service account key. A service account can have up to 10 keys. Service account keys that you create don't have an expiry date and stay valid until you delete them.
commands.name: gcp-iam-service-account-key-create

commands.description: Retrieves the IAM access control policy for the specified organization.
commands.name: gcp-iam-organization-iam-policy-get

commands.description: Adds a new organization IAM policy.
commands.name: gcp-iam-organization-iam-policy-create

commands.description: Adds members to the folder policy.
commands.name: gcp-iam-folder-iam-member-add

commands.description: Retrieves the IAM access control policy for the specified project.
commands.name: gcp-iam-project-iam-policy-get

commands.description: Creates a custom project role.
commands.name: gcp-iam-project-role-create

commands.description: Lists project under the specified parent, or retrieves a specific project's information. One of the following arguments must be provided: "parent" or "project_name".
commands.name: gcp-iam-projects-get

commands.description: Removes permissions from a custom organization role.
commands.name: gcp-iam-organization-role-permission-remove

commands.description: Adds a new project IAM policy.
commands.name: gcp-iam-project-iam-policy-create

commands.description: Adds members to the organization policy.
commands.name: gcp-iam-organization-iam-member-add

commands.description: Lists every predefined role that IAM supports.
commands.name: gcp-iam-role-list

commands.description: Adds members to the project policy.
commands.name: gcp-iam-project-iam-member-add

commands.description: Lists groups that are visible to the caller.
commands.name: gcp-iam-group-list

commands.description: Create a short-lived access token for a service account. The generated token will be exposed to the context menu and War Room, and can potentially be logged.
commands.name: gcp-iam-service-account-generate-access-token

commands.description: Enables a project service account.
commands.name: gcp-iam-service-account-enable

commands.description: Enables a service account key.
commands.name: gcp-iam-service-account-key-enable

commands.description: Retrieves a group information.
commands.name: gcp-iam-group-get

commands.description: Lists folders under the specified parent, or retrieves a specific folder information. One of the arguments: 'parent' or 'folder_name'  must be provided.
commands.name: gcp-iam-folders-get

commands.description: Lists group memberships.
commands.name: gcp-iam-group-membership-list

commands.description: Retrieves the IAM access control policy for the specified folder.
commands.name: gcp-iam-folder-iam-policy-get

commands.description: Adds a group membership role.
commands.name: gcp-iam-group-membership-role-add

commands.description: Deletes a group membership.
commands.name: gcp-iam-group-membership-delete

commands.description: Lists the organization custom roles.
commands.name: gcp-iam-organization-role-list

commands.description: Returns permissions that a caller has on the specified project. The permission list can be obtained by running the 'gcp-iam-testable-permission-list' command.
commands.name: gcp-iam-project-iam-permission-test

commands.description: Creates a custom organization role.
commands.name: gcp-iam-organization-role-create

commands.description: Returns permissions that a caller has on the specified organization. The permission list can be obtained by running the 'gcp-iam-testable-permission-list' command.
commands.name: gcp-iam-organization-iam-permission-test

commands.description: Deletes a group.
commands.name: gcp-iam-group-delete

commands.description: Deletes a service account.
commands.name: gcp-iam-service-account-delete

commands.description: Deletes a custom project role.
commands.name: gcp-iam-project-role-delete

commands.description: Removes a policy from the folder IAM policies.
commands.name: gcp-iam-folder-iam-policy-remove

commands.description: Sets the IAM access control policy for the specified folder. This operation will overwrite any existing policy.
commands.name: gcp-iam-folder-iam-policy-set

commands.description: Returns permissions that a caller has on the specified folder. The permission list can be obtained by running the 'gcp-iam-testable-permission-list' command.
commands.name: gcp-iam-folder-iam-permission-test

commands.description: Sets the IAM access control policy for the specified organization. This operation will overwrite any existing policy.
commands.name: gcp-iam-organization-iam-policy-set

commands.description: Removes permissions from a custom project role.
commands.name: gcp-iam-project-role-permission-remove

commands.description: Lists every permission that can be tested on a resource.
commands.name: gcp-iam-testable-permission-list

commands.description: Adds permissions to a custom project role.
commands.name: gcp-iam-project-role-permission-add

commands.description: Deletes a service account key.
commands.name: gcp-iam-service-account-key-delete

commands.description: Create a new group. The end user making the request will be added as the initial owner of the group.
commands.name: gcp-iam-group-create

commands.description: Lists a project custom roles.
commands.name: gcp-iam-project-role-list

commands.description: Adds permissions to a custom organization role.
commands.name: gcp-iam-organization-role-permission-add

commands.description: Retrieves group membership information.
commands.name: gcp-iam-group-membership-get

commands.description: Retrieves a custom project role.
commands.name: gcp-iam-project-role-get

commands.description: Lists service accounts in project, or retrieves a specific service accounts information. One of the arguments: 'service_account_name' or 'project_name'  must be provided.
commands.name: gcp-iam-service-accounts-get

commands.description: Removes members from the organization policy.
commands.name: gcp-iam-organization-iam-member-remove

commands.description: Updates a custom organization role.
commands.name: gcp-iam-organization-role-update

commands.description: Retrieves the GCP IAM predefined role information.

commands.name: gcp-iam-organization-role-get

commands.description: Creates a group membership.
commands.name: gcp-iam-group-membership-create

commands.description: Disables a project service account.
commands.name: gcp-iam-service-account-disable

commands.description: Lists organization resources that are visible to the caller, or retrieves an organization's information.
commands.name: gcp-iam-organizations-get

commands.description: Removes a group membership role.
commands.name: gcp-iam-group-membership-role-remove

commands.description: Updates a custom project role.
commands.name: gcp-iam-project-role-update

commands.description: Lists roles that can be granted on a Google Cloud resource. A role is grantable if the IAM policy for the resource can contain bindings to the role.
commands.name: gcp-iam-grantable-role-list

commands.description: Removes members from the project policy.
commands.name: gcp-iam-project-iam-member-remove

commands.description: Updates a service account.
commands.name: gcp-iam-service-account-update

commands.description: Removes the policy from the project IAM policies.
commands.name: gcp-iam-project-iam-policy-remove

commands.description: Deletes a custom organization role.
commands.name: gcp-iam-organization-role-delete

integration.description: Manage identity and access control for Google Cloud Platform resources.
integration.name: GCP-IAM

name: GCP IAM
